newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Malaysia's Saujana debuts at 4.00 rgt.
newsitem.headline: Malaysia's Saujana debuts at 4.00 rgt.

text.p: Saujana Consolidated Bhd debuted on the main board of the Kuala Lumpur Stock Exchange on Tuesday at 4.00 ringgit, against a 1.85 ringgit offer price.
The golf, hotel and property development concern's offering consisted of 8.91 million existing stock and 11.14 million new shares.
At 0135 GMT, the stock was trading at 4.04 ringgit.
For the year ended December 31, 1995, the company posted a net profit of 7.73 million ringgit or 7.8 cents per share on turnover of 70.72 million ringgit.
It has forecast a net profit of 11.53 million ringgit or 22.2 cents per share for this year.
